data.title: List of Julia Roberts Movies

data.text:
Julia Roberts, a prominent figure in Hollywood, has captivated audiences with her versatile acting skills and charismatic presence. With a career spanning several decades, she has become one of the most beloved actresses in the industry. Julia Roberts has starred in a total of 50 movies to date, showcasing her talent in a variety of genres ranging from romantic comedies to intense dramas. Her impressive filmography is a testament to her enduring appeal and significant contributions to cinema.

About Julia Roberts

Julia Roberts Movie List

FAQs about Julia Roberts Movies

Q1: What is Julia Roberts’ most successful movie?

A: Julia Roberts’ most successful movie in terms of box-office collection is “Pretty Woman,” which grossed $463.4 million worldwide.

Q2: Has Julia Roberts won any Academy Awards?

A: Yes, Julia Roberts won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her role in “Erin Brockovich” (2000).

Q3: Which movie marked Julia Roberts’ breakthrough role?

A: Julia Roberts’ breakthrough role was in “Pretty Woman” (1990), which established her as a leading actress in Hollywood.

Q4: How many movies has Julia Roberts starred in?

A: As of now, Julia Roberts has starred in 50 movies.

Q5: Are there any Julia Roberts movies available on Netflix?

A: Yes, several Julia Roberts movies are available on Netflix, including “Pretty Woman,” “Wonder,” “August: Osage County,” “Eat Pray Love,” “Valentine’s Day,” and “Charlie Wilson’s War.”
